extends java.util.Observable
    Author:
    Hung Tran, cperez4

    Course: CSC 335 Fall 2020

    Created: Dec 2, 2020 File: GameModel.java Desc: This file is a model class for the social deduction card-game

                      Deck sharedDeck,

      • generateEvent

        public void generateEvent()
        Creates an event in the game model. This forces the group of players to resolve the event.

      • generateEvent

        public void generateEvent​(EventCard event)
        Forcefully makes this game model "focus" on 'event', forces the group of players to resolve 'event'
        Parameters:
        event - the event to be forcefully "focused"

      • resolveEvent

        public boolean resolveEvent()
        resolves the current event,
        Returns:
        true if the event was a success or false if it failed

      • eliminate

        public int eliminate​(java.lang.String name)
        eliminates a player form the game
        Returns:
        0 if the player was eliminated successfully, -1 if the player was already eliminated

      • isGameOver

        public int isGameOver()
        checks to see if any of the end-game conditions have been met
        Returns:
        -1 if the game is not over, 0 if the group wins, 1 if the saboteur wins

        public void nextTurn()

        Adds 'card' into played cards
        Parameters:

      • emptyPlayed

        public void emptyPlayed()
        Clears the played cards list

      • makeProgress

        public void makeProgress​(char c)
        Makes this game model to make progress.
        Parameters:
        c - 'p' if the event passed, otherwise, interpret as 'f' (falled)
